case.title: Seeking curvy girl that loves to 420
case.text: 28 Very attractive guy who loves to 420 seeking a cute fun curvy girl that loves to smoke as much as I do. 20-29 Race and type not important but I do lean to curvier girls ;) Busty/Curvy - nice size waist with hips and thighs all a plus. I have a nice place to host in williamsburg, so be ok with traveling here. We can smoke some of the best 420 in the city! And if you party/roll or maybe curious to try I have access to that as well. Drop me a line with a pic and info. Put "420 lover" in subject so I know you're not spam. Looking to hang soon so if your interested email me
